archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Print Monitoring Software, Blueprint
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Peter Daniel, Printing and Stationery (ITS): On Tuesday 23 June, Printing and Stationery and IT Services will be conducting an essential upgrade of the Blueprint print monitoring software. This means that printing will not be available from 5:00pm on Monday 22 June until midday on Tuesday 23 June.
The main print servers will be unavailable during this time, which will cause disruption to all university printing. We shall ensure that the down time is kept to a minimum, however to limit the impact we ask that all colleagues plan ahead for their printing needs.
